EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-06-14-RD-Sponsored-Reston.Invite 1 - Sent 053118.Reston Lunch - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited! IT Networking Luncheon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’d like to cordially invite you to an exclusive networking event in Reston on June 14th at McCormick & Schmick’s.
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly. Reston IT Networking Luncheon <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/reston-it-networking-luncheon-tickets-45563663143]]> McCormick & Schmick’s Thursday, Jun 14th | 11:30 AM
Throughout the afternoon, you’ll have the chance to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud.
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/reston-it-networking-luncheon-tickets-45563663143]]> We hope you will join us.
Sincerely, The Turbonomic Team
